owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Information about the provenance, such as origin, ownership and custodial history (chain of custody), of a resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:editorialNote: See also the ARM Ontology for strategies to model this information in greater detail.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Suggested use - With Work, Instance or Item
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Custodial history
